description.p: Forged in the heart of the Umbral Forge, the Shadowsteel Sword is a longsword infused with dark energies that draw strength from shadows. The blade absorbs ambient light, dimming its surroundings when drawn.

The Shadowsteel Sword is a magic, sentient weapon that grants a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. When attacking a creature in dim light or darkness, the sword deals an additional 2d8 necrotic damage.
While the sword is on your person, you gain darkvision out to a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision, the range increases by 30 feet.
Once per long rest, as an action, you can cast shadow blade (save DC 16) from the sword. The sword regains the ability to cast this spell at the next dawn.

Sentience. The Shadowsteel Sword is a sentient neutral evil weapon with an Intelligence of 12, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 18. It has darkvision out to a range of 120 feet and can communicate telepathically with its wielder.

Personality. The sword seeks to be wielded by those who walk in the shadows and thrive in the darkness. It encourages its wielder to shun the light and embrace the night, whispering temptations to seek power in darkness.
The Radiant-Infused Shield is a magical shield blessed by celestial beings. The shield's surface glows faintly with divine light, granting protection and healing properties to its wielder.
You have a +1 bonus to AC while wielding this shield. In addition, the shield has 3 charges and regains 1d3 expended charges daily at dawn.
As a reaction when a creature within 5 feet of you takes damage, you can expend 1 charge to grant that creature 2d6 temporary hit points. These hit points last for 1 minute.

While holding the shield, you can use an action to cast shield of faith (save DC 15) or cure wounds at 1st level. Once either spell is cast, it cannot be cast again from the shield until the next dawn.
Personality. The shield embodies a strong will to protect the innocent and defend against evil. It urges its wielder to stand as a guardian, protecting others and showing mercy to the helpless.
This Greatsword is a magical sword blessed by dumb barbarians.
You have a +1 bonus to being gay.
As a reaction when a creature within 5 feet of you takes damage, you can cry as a free action.
